div.p:
Curia capitalis burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem octavo
ix die mensis Januarij Anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo
Nonagesimo Septimo quo die sectis vocatis et curia
affirmata et cetera

Eodem die omnes actiones et cause nunc decernendas propter
personalem existenciam Illustrissimj domini nostri Regis infra
dictum burgum et suorum dominorum consilij continuantur vsque
in feriam sextam proximo futuro videlicet xijam diem dicti mensis
In similibus forma modo effectu prout prius fuerunt et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xij
die Januarij quo Supra

The saide day thir personis follouing that is to say the wif of Wilyeam
of chamer the wif of mathow branche the wif of James strachin
the wif of Robert huchosone the douchtir of the wif of Sanct Androwis
the wif of Jonhne ramsay and the wif of Dauid beuerlay Ilkan of
thame conuikit and in ane amerciament of the court for the brekin of assis'
and common ordinance in selling of xij d' aile agan the statutis
of the tone and to Amend' as law wil et cetera and forber' in tym tocum and
thomas Waus committis for his wif be his avne tong gravnt

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Richardus andirson procurator magistri
alexandri fyf capellanj altaris beate marie virginis infra ecclesiam beati nicholaij
de abirdene fundati et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu
duorum solidorum sibi et dicto altarj annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente
infra le greyne inter terram gilberti muresone ex australi et communionem
viam regiam ex boreali et torrentes siue riuolos ex orientali et occidentali partibus
ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terras et lapides quos
ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam secundo'secundo' overwrites 'primo'. die huius processus Testibus
alexandro chamer Johanne scot et thoma Symsone seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Andreas chamer collector capellanorum
Collegij de abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma iuris pro vno annuo
redditu xiij s' et iiij d' sibi capellanis annuatim debit' de quodam crofto olim
richardi Kintor Jacente in territorio croftorum de rubislaw ex boreali parte
vie regie qua Itur ad molendinum Justiciarij inter croftum Andree murray
ex orientali et croftum ex ex occidentali ad quod croftum
accedens nichil reperit distringible preter terram et lapides quos ballivis
in sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam die huius processus testibus alexandro
chamer fratre suo Johanne Scot et thoma Symsone seriando

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis with avis' of the court assignit
this day xv dais to patrik rede and Richerd' Wricht to comper
befor thame and ansuer' to Jonhne Sanclar anent the frethin and rele
ving of him and his half lande yerlie of xx s' and vj d' of annuele
eftir the tenor and commavnde of our Souerane lordis lettres direkit
to tham tharupone chargeand bath the partiis to bring thar richtis
and documentis with thame the saide day quhilkis thai wile vys'
for ministracion of Justice to be hed' in the saide matir

The xv day of Januar the yer forsaide it was fundin that androw
muresone is avand to androw Williamsone duelland' in Edane
x s' and iiij d' to be pait within terme of law
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die Januarij quo supra

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne of mar'
forspekar that thir personis thome Kynnoir' Dauid club Robert scleiche Johanne fynne
Androw badenaghe Johne Dys' thomas elmyslie William fynne and Alexander
sal content and pay to sere Jonhe litstar perpetuale chaplan'
of Sanctis Crispinj and crispinianj altar thar part of his fee
yerlie and termlie aucht and wont siclik as it is ordanit be the
deknys and worthiast of the craft that is to say ilkan of thame

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xix
die Januarij quo Supra

Eodem die Alexander Jonhnsone famulus alexandri talyour conuictus per assisam
ex ore thome prat prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Andree many secundum
Dauid talyour / Cuj emendabit ut iura volunt et Idem andreas
quitus de perturbio dicti alexandri Insuper pro emenda diliberatum fuit
per assisam quod dictus alexander soluet parti lese v s' et si dictum Andream
aut aliquem alium In postrum perturbauerit et inde conuictus fuerit
expelletur de villa et hoc ex ore Dauid menyeis prelocutoris eiusdem

the saide day it was deliuerit and ordanit be the consal Dauid
menyes forspekar that mathow toschow sal pay to Duncan baxtar
v s' for part of the amendis of the hurting of him and v s' to
Johne barbour' for his leching

head.add: Anent the pament of our Soueran lordis propin

div.p:
The xxxiij xxiij of Januar' the yer forsaid' thir personis eftir
follouing that is to say Robert blinsele Dauid menyeis Johne
of Cullane Alexander of chamer Jonhne Colisone Thomas prat Thomas
fyf Alexander of mar' and Jonhne of Knollis Ilkan of tham has grantit
of thar avne fre will for the common' profit of this tone

The xxiij day of Januar the yer forsaid' the haile
Consale and diuers' of the comunite present for the tyme represen
tand' the body of the tone' with ane Consent and assent
grantit and ordanit that the xxxij li' restand' aving tile
our Souerane lordis propin gevin to his hienes at the
yule immediat gane obefor be rasit and vptakin of
the girssomis of thir wattiris of the next assedacion'
to be maid' and to be allouit to the personis payris
in thar girssomez samekile as euere man pais

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvjo
die Januarij quo Supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis to Johne
Sanclar to ansuer to the borghe' strekit one him be Dauid spens
for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xix s' to compt and rekning

The said' day comperit Jonhne Sanclar' and follouit patrik
red and Richerd Wricht to freithe ande releywe of him yerlie
of the pament of xx s' and vj d' of ane annuel Rent as porcionaris
of ane half lande and tenment and the tothir half pertening to him in
fee and heritage eftir the tenor of our Souerane lordis lettres directit
to the aldirman and balyeis for ministracion of Justice in the saide
matir as day assignit to bath the said' partiis to bring and schew
thar richtis ande documentis quhilkis thai hede and walde vs'
tharintill Ande the aldirman and balyeis accusit the saide patrik and Richerd
sayand' that thai aucht to freithe and releiwe the saide Jonhne of xx s'
and vj d' of annuel as said' is quhilkis thai denyit And' thareftir with
consent of bath the said partiis the saide action' was put to the
decision' of ane assis' of thir personis that is to say Robert blinsel
Jonhne of Cullane Jonhne Colison' William blinsel David matheson'
alexander gray Robert crag thomas prat William of chamer David mar'
William gareauche Dauid murray William Wormet James
colison' and William nicholson' quhilkis riplie auisit the gret aithis
Suorne the richtis and allegacionis of bath the saide partiis herd and seyn'
deliuerit be the moutht of the said Robert blinsel forspekar of the saide
assis' that the saide patrik Aw nocht to reliwe the said John of nay part of
the said annuelis for ony thing that thai hede seyn' and in likuis' thai fand'
the said' Richerd' quyt of the frethin of the saide Johne anent the pament of the
saide annuell he payand' x s' of the hail annuell as he pait obefor

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxix die
Januarij quo Supra

The saide day mathow toschow was in ane amerciament of the court be ane
Suorne assis' Dauid menyeis forspekar for the strubulance of marione of
gordon' Spous to James colisone in iniurious' and sclanderous lanagis
and to Amend' as law wil and forber' in tym to cum And in likuis' magis
etale conuikit be the saide assis' for strubulance of the said marion' et cetera and
the said' marion' quyt' of al strubulance of thame et cetera

The saide day it was ordanit and deliuerit be the aldirman and consal
for the offence and strubulance done be mathow toschow and his wif
to marion' of gordone that thai salbe put in the goif thar to stand'
at the will of James colisone and his wif Ande cum one sonday
that next cumis in tym of the hie mes' with ane candill in Ilkan
of thir handis and ask the saidez marion' and James forgivnes for the
offens' done to tham and thai sal say the lanagis and iniurious'
sclander that thai hed' said' to the saide marion' was fals'
and that thai leit in thar hedis Ande gif euire thai happyne
to quit ony offence to the saide James or marion' or til
ony vthir in tymes to Cum and beis conuikit tharof salbe expellit
out of this tone'

The saide day It was ordanit be the haile consal that the general
assedacion that was diuisit for xix yeris quhilkis was distroit
be the lordis of consale that the Seile suld' be tane fra it
quhilk sele was distroit in presence of the hail consal et cetera

James be the grace of gode kinge of scottis Till ale and sindrie
our' officiaris liegis and subditis quhame It efferis quhais knavledge
thir' our' lettres salcum And in speciale our' admirall ande his deputis
now present and tocum greting fforsamekle' as we causit of our command
ment our' louit familiar' squiar' nichole ransay master' of our schip
Callit the mare bartane to pas' diuers' Raissis of our' Realme
in warfar' in contrar' our' auld Innemeis of Ingland Ande as we
ar Informit our said admirall ande his deputis wexis ande
trublis the saide nichole be thare arrestmentis ande askis and'
Requiris admiralite of our saide schip to the gret tribull of our
said seruitour ande in contrar' Justice gif it sa be Quhar'for we
commande and charge our saide admirale now present ande his deputis
and al vtheris our admirallis and' thar' deputis tocum our' officiaris
liegis and subidits forsaides that nane of youe tak vpone hande
to ask or Requir' admiralite of ony maner' of gudis wone witht
our saide schip fra the saide nicholl his factouris or ony of his
seruitouris or yet that ye or thai mak ony arestment molestacion'
tribull or Iniur' to the saide nicholl his factouris or seruitouris
in thar' personis landis or gudis for ony gudis wonnyn be our
saide schip in ony tyme bigane ande tocum vndir all the hiest
pane charge and offence that ye and ilk and' of youe may commit and Inrin'
agane our' maiestate in that part Dischargeing youe our'
admirall now present and your deputis and' all vthiris our' admirallis
tocum and thare deputis of your and thare officis in that part
be thir' our lettres The quhilk we will Endur' for al the daies and
of the saide nicholes liff gevin vndir our Priue seill at Abirdene the
xxv day of december the yer' of god et cetera lxxxxvij yeris And'
of our' Regnne' the tend' yer'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vltimo
die Januarij

the saide day Jonhe mathesone and Robert matheson' his brothir
grantit that thai and thar botismen' cuttit ane lyne pertening to
Sandy Kennoche and thome neill for the quhilkis Ilkan of tham was in ane Amerciament
of the court and to Amend' as law will and forber' in tym to cum et cetera

The saide day it was statute and ordanit be the aldirman and the consale
for commone profite of the tone that any aile be sauld' derrar' thane
viij d' the gallone within this burghe quhil michaelmes next to cum
vndir the pane of law

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio quinto die mensis
februarij anno Supra

The saide day It was Statut' and ordanit be the aldirman ande
consaile that the Some of threttj and tua pundis to be rasit
and vptane be of the balyeis for the pament and redschip of our
Souerane lordis propin salbe allouit in the malis or girrsomes'
to the personis payaris of the Samyn of thar takis

The saide day Jonhne andirsone was conuikit be ane assis' Ro
bert blinsel for the strubulance of Sandy burnat in word and als'
that he did' nocht to the commission' that he sulde haf done et cetera and for
the quhilk he was in ane amerciament of the courtis and to Amend' as law
wil and forber' in tyme to Cum Ande the assis' continevit the
amendis to be considerit be the aldirman and consale the next friday
and ordanit to tak Souerte of the saide Jonhne to Entir the
said' day befor thame for ministracion of Justice in that matir

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem ix die
februarij anno quo Supra

head.add: Evmonde de belays wiffis compt Sende to Androw louson'

div.p:
The saide day mastir Jonhne badenaghe forspekar for Androw louson'
producit ane bill of compt and rekning send to him fra the widew
of evmond' debelay portar of brugis in Jugement and askit the samyn
to be copeit in tentywe forme with the clerkis hande and ane certifica
cion' of the Samyn vndir the Secret seile gif nedis be quhilkis
the aldirman and balyeis grantit to the saide Androw

The saide day Agnes thomsone was in ane amerciament of the court be ane
Suorne assis' Jonhne colisone forspekar for the wranguis' spekinge
of iniurious' langagis of the aldirman and to amend as law wile and forber
In tyme to cum

The saide day It was deliuerit be the saide assis' that the saide Agnes
was in ane amerciament of the Court for the breking of common' ordinance
in Selling of wyne quhilkis scho bocht withotyn auentour' in the
tone' and to amend' as law will et cetera

The saide day the saide agnes thomsone was in ane amerciament of
the court for the wranguis' vpstrikin of ane tavarne dur' set
to Duncan Smytht' et cetera

the saide day It was statut and ordanit be the consal that nayn aile be
sauld' derrar' thane viij d' the gallon' quhil michaelmes day
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xij die februarij

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Dauid menyeis
forspekar that
